module.p: Glottonyms are names identifying languages and other language varieties.

Like other kinds of name, glottonyms can be classified into two grammatical types –
glottonymic proper nouns – Laideann Latin, (a’) B[h]eurla English
glottonymic name-descriptions – A’ Ghrèigis Greek, Gàidhlig na h-Èireann Irish (Gaelic)
